about_the_game:
《Tomorrow's Love Puzzle》is an interactive live-action video game where you step into the shoes of a workplace employee named "Tomorrow". Harbored with life aspirations, you've been relentlessly trampled over in five years of working life. Yet, fortune smiles upon you as six beautiful women arrive in succession, immersing you in a first-person perspective love story.

The quiet and gentle school beauty, "Chu Chu".

The sexy and mature client, a female boss named "Jin Xiao".

The mysterious girl, "Ni Keer".

The intellectual and stable baking teacher, "Yu Anran".

The straightforward and cheerful lifeguard, "Wang Yiman".

The cute and kind childhood friend, "Tian Tiantian".


Product Features:
• A novel live-action interactive game, experience immersive love stories with six distinct women from the male protagonist's subjective perspective. Who you end up with is up to "you" in front of the screen.
• Unlike other romance games, we offer not only excellent film materials but also delve deeper into gameplay. Based on the storyline, players can chat with the heroines, view their social circles, and engage in other gameplay to understand more about the plot's periphery, deeply interacting with the heroines.
• As the friendship level increases, the real past of the heroines will be unlocked, with more background stories awaiting your exploration.
• We'll automatically tag exciting videos and pictures for easy browsing.
• Unlock six uniquely styled girls - a cold and noble witch, an elegant and contrasting senior, an energetic straight-shooter sports girl, a cute and adorable girl-next-door, and a mysterious and ever-changing young lady. There's a type of warmth that will strike directly at your heart, and your love stories with them begin tomorrow...

Game Production and Theme:
This game is produced by Youyuan Media, in collaboration with Youku Video and San Zhi Xi Que Media. It is the first game jointly developed with a mainstream video platform. In this era of frequent interactive video products, we aim to create a "different" product, offering men a top-tier emotional value themed on freedom and pure love. After months of development, we assembled a team including well-known scriptwriters, directors, and game production experts.
The male protagonist is a humble office worker, repeatedly oppressed in five years of working life, facing his boss's manipulations and colleagues' squeezes - a true reflection of what many of us experience daily. Fortunately, he meets six charming but different women, bringing endless color and joy to his otherwise dull life. We hope that if you're trapped in life and work, you will find some comfort and joy here.

A Few Words from the Heart:
Our team worked hard to polish a good story. The producers, directors, and scriptwriters argued daily over the plot to select the perfect heroines that cater to different players' aesthetic preferences from over 500 acting resumes. It turns out everyone has different tastes! To find a more authentic feeling of love, the game developers racked their brains to develop gameplay. Everything we do is to find "that soft spot in your heart", regardless of whether the person beside you now is right or wrong, or whatever your circumstances may be. We want to tell you that no matter what choice you make, tomorrow will be better.

About Youyuan:
We are a group of young people from all over the country, with various specialties and personalities, gathered in Shanghai, dreaming of games and art. We aim to capture beautiful moments through the lens and games, delivering sweet feelings of love and freedom to our users.
This is our first game, and we hope you like it.
